content.json: ## Recorded Future -  C&C DNS Name to DNS Events - Correlation/Threat Hunting

content.query:
ThreatIntelligenceIndicator
| where TimeGenerated {Threat_Intelligence_Time_Range:query}
| where Description contains 'Recorded Future - DOMAIN - C2 DNS Name'
| where DomainName == "{IOC}"
| where ExpirationDateTime > now()
| extend Evidence=parse_json(AdditionalInformation)['EvidenceDetails']
| take 1
| mv-expand Evidence
| project Rules = Evidence['Rule'], Evidence_String = Evidence['EvidenceString'], Criticality = Evidence['Criticality']
| sort by toint(Criticality) desc
